content.question: Moving clockwise from left: Two points labeled A and B are marked on the circumference of the circle: Point B lies in quadrant 2. Point A lies in quadrant 3 vertically below point B. The points O, A, and B are joined by three segments to form a triangle symmetrical about the x axis. The figure shows equilateral triangle <math alttext="A B O"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>O</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> with sides of length <math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. Segment <math alttext="A B"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is perpendicular to the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis. The terminal ray of an angle <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (not shown) in standard position passes through the point <math alttext="B"><semantics><mi>B</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="10 sin theta"> <mn>10</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mi>θ</mi> </math>?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
